posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
Scans of the following raw cards are available today.  Prices include shipping.

Jordan - $150
Speaker - $750
Sallee - SOLD
Wiltse - $150
Chance - $350
Bescher - tough card - $175
Doolan - $175
Paskert - tough card - $150
Smith - SOLD
Mullin - $150
Niles - SOLD
Overall (SGC 20) $250

Front scans of the following cards can be seen on the PSA registry under the #8 set (Drumback's Turkey Reds).  All have clean back except for Young, which has some staining.

Brown - authentic (not sure why) - $350
Mitchell - authentic (recolored corners, very well done) - $175
Stahl - PSA 2 - $275
Young - PSA 2 - $1750

Scans of the following cards will be available later this week.

Cobb - raw - SOLD
Joss - raw - SOLD
Kleinow - PSA 2 - $300
McIntyre, Brooklyn only - very tough card - PSA 1 - $300
Konetchy - PSA 3 MK - $275
Lennox - PSA 2 MK - $250
Wallace - PSA 3 MK - $450
McGraw - PSA 1 MK - $375
Pfeister - PSA 1 - very nice save for one tiny pinhole - $250

Posted By: Brian Collie
Please send scans of Chance and Speaker.  Thanks,

Posted By: Sylvain Corriveau
Hi , can I get scans of Salee,Jordan,Paskert and Mullin. Thanks Sylvain
